articles.title: Bitcoin Price Predictions for 2024
articles.excerpt: Experts weigh in on Bitcoin's price movements for the upcoming year.

articles.title: BONK Recovers Following 1.69 Trillion Token Burn
articles.excerpt: On December 26, 2024, the BONK Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO) completed a major milestone with the burn of 1.69 trillion BONK tokens. This event, known as BURNmas, aimed to reduce the total supply of the cryptocurrency, thereby increasing its scarcity and potentially boosting its market value.
